Here are the extracted sentences:

Previously the strength of interaction between rGILZ or wild type GILZ-P and r-p65 has been shown to be 5.91±2.4*10<sup>−7</sup>M and 1.12±0.25*10<sup>−6</sup>M, respectively.
The dissociate constant, K<sub>D</sub>, as calculated by the method of Friguet et al. was 2.29+/−0.2×10<sup>−6</sup>M for GA-1 and 3.24+/−0.19×10<sup>−6</sup>M for GA-2.
